channel.title: CVE Feed for dfactory -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for dfactory -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43924|2024-10-23T07:31:20.699Z -- dfactory -- responsive%20lightbox
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in dFactory Responsive Lightbox allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Responsive Lightbox: from n/a through 2.4.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-49282|2024-10-17T19:14:28.010Z -- dfactory -- responsive%20lightbox
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in dFactory Responsive Lightbox allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Responsive Lightbox: from n/a through 2.4.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-6870|2024-08-22T09:29:30.755Z -- dfactory -- responsive%20lightbox%20%26%20gallery
item.description: The Responsive Lightbox & Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via file uploads in all versions up to, and including, 2.4.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping affecting the rl_upload_image AJAX endpoint. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses the 3gp2 file.

item.title: CVE-2024-31252|2024-08-02T01:46:04.994Z -- dfactory -- responsive%20lightbox
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in dFactory Responsive Lightbox.This issue affects Responsive Lightbox: from n/a through 2.4.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-3230|2024-06-04T05:32:15.260Z -- dfactory -- download%20attachments
item.description: The Download Attachments plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'download-attachments' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-31252|2024-06-09T11:12:04.084Z -- dfactory -- responsive%20lightbox
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in dFactory Responsive Lightbox.This issue affects Responsive Lightbox: from n/a through 2.4.6.

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses the 3gp2 file.
